title: Study Abroad
content: Study Abroad 10 most budget-friendly countries for Indian students to study abroad Many countries offer Indian students high-quality education with affordable tuition and living costs. Here are the top 10 most budget-friendly study-abroad destinations to help you achieve your academic dreams.

title: DIU
content: DIU Tight contests in Delhi polls tell the story of AAP losing its base This time, Delhi witnessed a fiercer contest between AAP and BJP compared to 2020, with victory margins under 10,000 votes in 24 seats—up from 15 in 2020—of which the BJP won 16 and AAP eight.

title: News
content: Delhi Chief Minister's oath likely after PM Modi's return from US: Sources High-level BJP meetings are underway in New Delhi as the party deliberates on who will be the next Chief Minister of Delhi. The BJP is set to form the government in the national capital, ending a 27-year-long power drought. BJP to form government in Delhi after 27 years High-level discussions in Delhi, five leaders in race for top post Oath ceremony to be held after PM Modi's Feb 13 US visit

title: Cricket
content: ZIM vs IRE ZIM vs IRE, Only Test, Day 4: Live score and updates from Bulawayo ZIM vs IRE, Only Test, Day 4 Live score and updates: Zimbabwe stand runs away from the win, but have lost quick wickets to Ireland and that keeps the contest brimming with excitement.

title: UK News
content: UK News Categorically untrue: Britain on reports of it paying more to seal Chagos deal Britain's Foreign Office Minister Stephen Doughty said reports on the cost of payments to retain Chagos Islands rising from 9 billion pounds (USD 11.29 billion) to 18 billion pounds were "categorically untrue".
